mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SOLDERING(id, employeeId, state) VALUES (SOLDERING_ID_SEQ.nextval, #{employeeId}, #{state})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SOLDERING WHERE employeeId = #{employeeId} AND state = #{state} AND TRUNC(regDate) BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE)

SELECT * FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE ID IN ( SELECT EMPLOYEEID FROM COMMUTE WHERE state = 'WORK_ON' AND TRUNC(regDate) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)) AND ID NOT IN ( SELECT EMPLOYEEID FROM COMMUTE WHERE state = 'WORK_OFF' AND TRUNC(regDate) = TRUNC(SYSDATE))
